setMethod()

setMethod(string $method) : self

Sets the HTTP method for the request (GET, POST, etc).

Recognized methods are OPTIONS, GET, HEAD, POST, PUT, DELETE, TRACE, and CONNECT, GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, TRACE, OPTIONS, COPY, LOCK, MKCOL, MOVE, PROPFIND, PROPPATCH AND UNLOCK.

Parameters

string $method

The method to use for the request.

Throws

\Aura\Http\Message\Aura\Http\Exception\UnknownMethod

Returns

self

Tags

None found
